name: B.Bop Mania
description:
The Game doesn't want you to leave, and to stop you it has messed with your controller bindings!

Work your way through the levels and gradually earn enough coins to reassign your buttons to something that actually makes sense, and hope you make it out sane!

CONTROLLER REQUIRED!

Made during Global Game Jam 2020 with the theme "Repair"
